name: FalseHope
description:
A side-scroller shooter game inspired by Metal Slug, DeadSpace, Doom, and Hollow Knight.

This is just a demo that only features a gunfight. Please note that  SFX assets are scavenged from the Internet and please inform me if it has copyright infringement.

Please be noted that the game cannot be played in full screen at the moment.

If you don't know how to equip weapons, press "1" or "2" once you pick up the gun.

Have fun!
